title: Earth's Climate System
objectives: Describe the major components of Earth's climate system
Explain how energy from the sun drives climate

sequence.description: Discuss recent weather and climate patterns in local area
Analyze climate data graphs from different regions
Teacher presents climate system components and interactions
Students create concept maps of climate system
Written response: How does sun's energy drive climate?

misconceptions: Students may confuse weather and climate
Students may think climate doesn't change naturally
keyQuestions: What is the difference between weather and climate?
How do Earth's systems interact to create climate?
teachingGuidance.differentiationNotes: Provide sentence stems for students needing writing support
